parameters.query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_active,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'SUBMITTED') as submitted,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'NEEDS_INFO') as needs_info,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TECHNICAL_REVIEW') as tech_review,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'COMMERCIAL_REVIEW') as comm_review,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'MGMT_APPROVAL') as mgmt_approval,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'APPROVED_TO_SUBMIT') as approved,
  SUM(estimated_value) as total_value,
  AVG(completeness_score) as avg_completeness,
  AVG(win_probability_score) as avg_win_prob
FROM bids
WHERE status NOT IN ('WON', 'LOST', 'NO_DECISION', 'ARCHIVED')

SELECT 
  b.id, b.reference_number, b.title, b.client_name,
  b.submission_deadline,
  EXTRACT(DAY FROM (b.submission_deadline - NOW())) as days_remaining,
  b.status, b.priority, b.estimated_value
FROM bids b
WHERE b.submission_deadline BETWEEN NOW() AND NOW() + INTERVAL '3 days'
AND b.status NOT IN ('WON', 'LOST', 'NO_DECISION', 'ARCHIVED', 'SUBMITTED_TO_CLIENT')
ORDER BY b.submission_deadline ASC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  r.id, r.bid_id, r.review_type, r.assigned_at, r.due_at,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - r.due_at))/3600 as hours_overdue,
  b.reference_number, b.title, b.client_name, b.priority,
  rv.name as reviewer_name, rv.telegram_chat_id
FROM reviews r
JOIN bids b ON r.bid_id = b.id
JOIN reviewers rv ON r.assigned_to = rv.id
WHERE r.decision = 'PENDING'
AND r.due_at < NOW()
AND NOT r.sla_breached
ORDER BY r.due_at ASC

UPDATE reviews SET sla_breached = TRUE, escalated_at = NOW()
WHERE decision = 'PENDING' AND due_at < NOW() AND NOT sla_breached
RETURNING id

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE outcome_recorded_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days') as total_decided,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'WON' AND outcome_recorded_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days') as won,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'LOST' AND outcome_recorded_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days') as lost,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'NO_DECISION' AND outcome_recorded_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days') as no_decision,
  COALESCE(SUM(actual_contract_value) FILTER (WHERE status = 'WON' AND outcome_recorded_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'), 0) as won_value,
  COALESCE(SUM(estimated_value) FILTER (WHERE status = 'LOST' AND outcome_recorded_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'), 0) as lost_value,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days') as new_submissions,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'WON' AND outcome_recorded_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days') / 
    NULLIF(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE outcome_recorded_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'), 0), 1) as win_rate
FROM bids

SELECT 
  rv.name,
  COUNT(*) as reviews_completed,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ad.decision = 'APPROVED') as approved,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ad.decision = 'REJECTED') as rejected,
  ROUND(AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ad.created_at - r.assigned_at))/3600), 1) as avg_response_hours
FROM reviewers rv
JOIN reviews r ON rv.id = r.assigned_to
JOIN approval_decisions ad ON r.id = ad.review_id
WHERE ad.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
GROUP BY rv.id, rv.name
ORDER BY reviews_completed DESC
LIMIT 10

INSERT INTO bid_analytics (
  period_type, period_start, period_end,
  total_bids, bids_won, bids_lost, bids_pending, bids_no_decision,
  win_rate, total_bid_value, won_value, lost_value
) VALUES (
  'weekly',
  (NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days')::date,
  NOW()::date,
  $1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9
)
ON CONFLICT (period_type, period_start) DO UPDATE SET
  bids_won = $2,
  bids_lost = $3,
  win_rate = $6,
  won_value = $8,
  lost_value = $9
